title: Is Donald Trump insane in his views of Covid 19? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion of trump's extremely insane behav….. oh. oops. I already said insane. So I think that's a resounding yes. trump's insane (“it's a democratic hoax") views of COVID19 (“one day it will disappear just like a miracle") are fairly fucking insane from my perspective.

No. Trump is an incredibly stupid and self-centered individual that simply ignores any adverse information, latches on to (and amplifies to an enormously exaggerated level) any positive information, and goes out of his way to “kill the messenger of adverse news!” Many despots have been so disposed and it is often the cause of their downfall.
